column2: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. engages in the retailing of home products. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California and currently employs 11,400 full-time employees. The firm operates retail stores in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia and the United Kingdom. The company operates through two segments: e-commerce and retail. The e-commerce segment has various merchandising strategies, such as Williams-Sonoma, Pottery Barn, Pottery Barn Kids, West Elm, PBteen, Williams-Sonoma Home, Rejuvenation and Mark and Graham, which sell its products through the Company's e-commerce Websites and direct-mail catalogs. The retail segment has various merchandising strategies, such as Williams-Sonoma, Pottery Barn, Pottery Barn Kids, West Elm and Rejuvenation, which sell its products through the Company's retail stores. The firm franchises its brands to third parties in a number of countries in the Middle East, the Philippines and Mexico. The firm's products are also available to customers through its catalogs and online across the world.
